languages.text: The psyker can use a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} while being threatened by enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.
languages.original_text: Псайкер может использовать наносящие урон {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, даже если вблизи находятся противники. {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Психосилы{/g}, которые не наносят урон, в любом случае не провоцируют атаки по возможности.

traits.locale_text: The Psyker can use an attacking psychic power while being threatened by enemies in the melee zone without provoking attacks of opportunity. Non-attacking psychic powers do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this talent.

The psyker can use a damaging psychic power while being threatened by enemies in melee range without provoking attacks of opportunity. Non-damaging psychic powers do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this talent.

The psyker can use a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} while being threatened by enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

The psyker can use a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} while being threatened by enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

languages.text: 灵能者可以在敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内使用伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，而不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。另外，即便没有这项{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，非伤害性的{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}也不会触发借机攻击。
languages.original_text: The psyker can use a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} while being threatened by enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者可以在敌人近战攻击的范围内使用伤害性灵能，不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}另外，即便没有这项{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，非伤害性的{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}也不会触发借机攻击

languages.text: El psíquico puede usar un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} ofensivo bajo la amenaza de enemigos en alcance {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} no ofensivos no provocan ataques de oportunidad aun sin este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico puede usar un poder psíquico ofensivo bajo la amenaza de enemigos en {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} no ofensivos no provocan ataques de oportunidad aun sin este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}に敵が迫っている限り、異能者はダメージを与える{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使える。ダメージを与えない{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}サイキック・パワー{/g}については、この{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}がなくても機会攻撃を誘発しない。

languages.text: Der Psioniker kann eine schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} einsetzen, während er von Feinden in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} bedroht wird, ohne dadurch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Nicht-schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} provozieren selbst ohne dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} keine Gelegenheitsangriffe.

Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

Nicht-schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} provozieren selbst ohne dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} keine Gelegenheitsangriffe.

languages.text: Le psyker peut utiliser un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} qui inflige des dégâts lorsqu'il est menacé par des ennemis à portée de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qui n'infligent pas de dégâts ne provoquent pas d'attaques d'opportunité, même sans ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le psyker peut utiliser un pouvoir psychique qui inflige des dégâts lorsqu'il est menacé par des ennemis à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de mêlée sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qui n'infligent pas de dégâts ne provoquent pas d'attaques d'opportunité, même sans ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzilindeki{/g} düşmanların tehdidi altındayken {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemeden hasar veren bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullanabilir. Hasar vermeyen {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} olmasa bile fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemezler.
